Uses of Class
com.javagameengine.events.Event

  • Packages that use Event 
    Package Description
    com.javagameengine.events  

    • Uses of Event in com.javagameengine.events

      Subclasses of Event in com.javagameengine.events 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InputEvent
      Describes an Event that is associated with user input devices such as the mouse or keyboard.
      class  KeyEvent
      Describes a keyboard event in which a key is pressed, released, or held.
      class  MouseClickEvent
      Event describing a mouse button being clicked.
      class  MouseEvent
      Abstract event that describes an event triggered by a mouse.
      class  MouseMoveEvent
      Event describing a mouse moving across the screen.
      class  MouseScrollEvent
      Event describing the scroll wheel on the mouse being moved up or down.
      Fields in com.javagameengine.events with type parameters of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Class<? extends Event>,java.util.HashMap<Listener,java.lang.reflect.Method>> EventManager.methodCalls 
      Methods in com.javagameengine.events with parameters of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void EventManager.callEvent(Event e)
      Notifies all registered Listeners that the event has occurred and calls their methods (if any) that match the event.
